verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> we who are <S%G1415>strong<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> to <S%G941>bear<s%> the <S%G771>weaknesses<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G102>without<s%> <S%G102>strength<s%> and not [just] <S%G700>please<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves.<s%>
Let <S%G1538>each<s%> of us <S%G700>please<s%> his <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> for his <S%G18>good,<s%> to his <S%G3619>edification.<s%>

For <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> did not <S%G700>please<s%> <S%G1438>Himself;<s%> but as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "The <S%G3680>reproaches<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3679>reproached<s%> Thee <S%G1968>fell<s%> upon Me."

For <S%G3745>whatever<s%> was <S%G4270>written<s%> in <S%G4270>earlier<s%> <S%G4270>times<s%> was <S%G1125>written<s%> for our <S%G1319>instruction,<s%> that <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5281>perseverance<s%> and the <S%G3874>encouragement<s%> of the <S%G1124>Scriptures<s%> we might <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1680>hope.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> may the <S%G2316>God<s%> who <S%G1325>gives<s%> <S%G5281>perseverance<s%> and <S%G3874>encouragement<s%> <S%G1325>grant<s%> you to be of the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5426>mind<s%> with <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus;<s%>

that with <S%G3661>one<s%> <S%G3661>accord<s%> you may with <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4750>voice<s%> <S%G1392>glorify<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3962>Father<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G1352>Wherefore,<s%> <S%G4355>accept<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4355>accepted<s%> us to the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For I <S%G3004>say<s%> that <S%G5547>Christ<s%> has <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G1249>servant<s%> to the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> on <S%G5228>behalf<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G950>confirm<s%> the <S%G1860>promises<s%> [given] to the <S%G3962>fathers,<s%>

and for the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> to <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> for His <S%G1656>mercy;<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G1223>"Therefore<s%> <S%G3778><s%> I will <S%G1843>give<s%> <S%G1843>praise<s%> to Thee <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> And I will <S%G5567>sing<s%> to Thy <S%G3686>name.<s%>"
And <S%G3825>again<s%> he <S%G3004>says,<s%> <S%G2165>"Rejoice,<s%> O <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> with His <S%G2992>people.<s%>"
And <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G134>"Praise<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> you <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> And let <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>peoples<s%> <S%G1867>praise<s%> Him."

And <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> "There shall <S%G1510>come<s%> the <S%G4491>root<s%> of <S%G2421>Jesse,<s%> And He who <S%G450>arises<s%> to <S%G757>rule<s%> over the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> In Him shall the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1679>hope.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> may the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G4137>fill<s%> you with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> and <S%G1515>peace<s%> in <S%G4100>believing,<s%> that you may <S%G4052>abound<s%> in <S%G1680>hope<s%> by the <S%G1411>power<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

And <S%G4012>concerning<s%> you, my <S%G80>brethren,<s%> I <S%G846>myself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> am <S%G3982>convinced<s%> that you <S%G846>yourselves<s%> are <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G19>goodness,<s%> <S%G4137>filled<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge,<s%> and <S%G1410>able<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G3560>admonish<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>

But I have <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G5112>very<s%> <S%G5112>boldly<s%> to you on <S%G3313>some<s%> <S%G3313>points,<s%> <S%G5613>so<s%> as to <S%G1878>remind<s%> you <S%G1878>again,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that was <S%G1325>given<s%> me from <S%G2316>God,<s%>

to be a <S%G3011>minister<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G2418>ministering<s%> as a <S%G2418>priest<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> that [my] <S%G4376>offering<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> might <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2144>acceptable,<s%> <S%G37>sanctified<s%> by the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> found <S%G2746>reason<s%> for <S%G2746>boasting<s%> in things <S%G4314>pertaining<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For I will not <S%G5111>presume<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> of <S%G5100>anything<s%> <S%G3756>except<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> has <S%G2716>accomplished<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> me, <S%G1519>resulting<s%> in the <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> by <S%G3056>word<s%> and <S%G2041>deed,<s%>

in the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G4592>signs<s%> and <S%G5059>wonders,<s%> in the <S%G1411>power<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit;<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that from <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%G2945>round<s%> <S%G2945>about<s%> as <S%G3360>far<s%> as <S%G2437>Illyricum<s%> I have <S%G4137>fully<s%> <S%G4137>preached<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

And <S%G3779>thus<s%> I <S%G5389>aspired<s%> to <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel,<s%> not <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> was [already] <S%G3687>named,<s%> that I might not <S%G3618>build<s%> upon <S%G245>another<s%> man's <S%G2310>foundation;<s%>

but as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "They <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G312>had<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G312>news<s%> of Him shall <S%G3708>see,<s%> And they who have not <S%G191>heard<s%> shall <S%G4920>understand.<s%>"
For <S%G1352>this<s%> <S%G1352>reason<s%> I have <S%G4183>often<s%> been <S%G1465>hindered<s%> from <S%G2064>coming<s%> to you;

but <S%G3570>now,<s%> with <S%G3371>no<s%> <S%G3371>further<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> for me in <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2824>regions,<s%> and since I have <S%G2192>had<s%> for <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> a <S%G1974>longing<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to you

<S%G5613>whenever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> I <S%G4198>go<s%> to <S%G4681>Spain<s%> – for I <S%G1679>hope<s%> to <S%G2300>see<s%> you in <S%G1279>passing,<s%> and to be <S%G4311>helped<s%> on my <S%G4311>way<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> by you, when I have <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1705>enjoyed<s%> your company for a <S%G3313>while<s%> –
but <S%G3570>now,<s%> I am <S%G4198>going<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G1247>serving<s%> the <S%G40>saints.<s%>

For <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> and <S%G882>Achaia<s%> have <S%G2106>been<s%> <S%G2106>pleased<s%> to <S%G4160>make<s%> a <S%G2842>contribution<s%> for the <S%G4434>poor<s%> among the <S%G40>saints<s%> in <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%G1063>Yes,<s%> they were <S%G2106>pleased<s%> [to do so,] and they are <S%G3781>indebted<s%> to them. For <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> have <S%G2841>shared<s%> in their <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G4152>things,<s%> they are <S%G3784>indebted<s%> to <S%G3008>minister<s%> to them <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G4559>material<s%> <S%G4559>things.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore,<s%> when I have <S%G2005>finished<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> and have <S%G4972>put<s%> my <S%G4972>seal<s%> on <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of <S%G846>theirs,<s%> I will <S%G565>go<s%> on by <S%G1223>way<s%> of you to <S%G4681>Spain.<s%>
And I <S%G3609>know<s%> that when I <S%G2064>come<s%> to you, I will <S%G2064>come<s%> in the <S%G4138>fulness<s%> of the <S%G2129>blessing<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G3870>urge<s%> you, <S%G80>brethren,<s%> by our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> and by the <S%G26>love<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> to <S%G4865>strive<s%> <S%G4865>together<s%> with me in your <S%G4335>prayers<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> for me,

that I may be <S%G4506>delivered<s%> from <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G544>disobedient<s%> in <S%G2453>Judea,<s%> and [that] my <S%G1248>service<s%> for <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> may <S%G1096>prove<s%> <S%G2144>acceptable<s%> to the <S%G40>saints;<s%>
<S%G2443>so<s%> that I may <S%G2064>come<s%> to you in <S%G5479>joy<s%> by the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G4875>find<s%> [refreshing] <S%G4875>rest<s%> in your company.
<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> be with you <S%G3956>all.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
